mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CODE,BASE_VALUE FROM BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ORDER BY BASE_SORT asc
SELECT BASE_CODE,BASE_VALUE FROM BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='APPVSTATUS' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ORDER BY BASE_SORT asc

SELECT PM_IDX ,PM_PART_CODE ,pc.PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME ,bc.base_value as PM_PLANT ,pc.PART_COUNTRY as PM_COUNTRY ,ui.USER_NAME as PM_REG_USER ,NVL(PM_ACTIVE_YN, ' ') as PM_ACTIVE_YN ,NVL(PM_APPROVAL_STATUS, ' ') as PM_APPROVAL_STATUS ,NVL(TO_CHAR(PM_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),' ') as PM_APPROVAL_DATE FROM PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Base_code, base_value FROM base_code WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ) bc ON pc.PLANT_CODE = bc.base_code LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_INFO ui ON pmd.PM_REG_USER = ui.USER_ID WHERE 1 =1
AND (PM_PART_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_CODE}), '%'))
AND (PM_PART_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_NAME}), '%'))
AND (PM_REG_USER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_REG_USER}), '%'))
AND (PM_ACTIVE_YN = #{PM_ACTIVE_YN})
AND (PM_PLANT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PLANT}), '%'))
AND (PM_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_APPROVAL_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (PM_REG_DATE > #{PM_SDATE})
AND (PM_REG_DATE <= #{PM_EDATE})
